metadata.title: Primary productivity measurements in varying light conditions
metadata.description: A series of experiments studying photosynthetic uptake of carbon-14 by phytoplankton cultures after pre-exposure to various light regimes. The algae were kept in continuous log growth in a turbidostat.  Coordinated with photosynthesis vs. light intensity (PVI)  incubations of natural populations during cruises.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
